item.title: CSDN Unlocker
item.description: CSDN Unlocker is a Chrome extension that help you view or copy article without login.

item.title: Change Google Calendar Background

item.title: Mute Tabs

item.title: Night Mode Shift
item.description: All websites in the current window can be switched to night mode with just one click, and colors and their depth can be specified.
